text: Customer reported billing discrepancy for January invoice. Issue identified as duplicate charge for subscription service. Refund of $49.99 processed within 24 hours. Customer satisfied with quick resolution and apologized for the inconvenience.

Technical support call regarding login issues. Customer unable to access dashboard after password reset attempt. Troubleshooting steps: cleared browser cache and cookies, tried incognito mode. Issue persisted. Reset password via admin panel. Login successful. Provided additional security tips for future.

Sales inquiry about enterprise plan features. Potential customer currently managing 150+ users on business plan. Discussed benefits: unlimited users, dedicated account manager, priority support, custom integrations, API access with higher rate limits, SSO capabilities. Sent detailed proposal with pricing. Scheduled follow-up call for next week.
